recommendedPapers.title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers
recommendedPapers.abstract: We introduce a new language representation model called BERT, which stands for Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers.

recommendedPapers.title: GPT-3: Language Models are Few-Shot Learners
recommendedPapers.abstract: We demonstrate that scaling up language models greatly improves task-agnostic, few-shot performance.
